item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Arch Bishops of Eldregate are the highest ranking priests of the Awakening God. They wear holy replicas of the Sacred Shroud of the Prophet. This sacred piece of cloth gives them unsurpassed healing abilities. They have all but replaced the old Pontifices as religious magistrates of the Empire.
